overview:
In treatment while living at home and fit your job

Our treatment centers offer outpatient alcohol treatment in daytime and outside normal working hours, so you can stay home and keep your job while you are undergoing treatment for alcohol abuse.

Many believe that alcoholism is synonymous with a 5-week day stay, but recent research shows that about. 90% of Danish alcoholics have an equally good - and often better - treatment prognosis at an outpatient treatment center. And the price is approx. 1 / 3 of the price of one admission to a day treatment center.
